WRITING.TEXT: Dear Zachary: A Letter to a Son About His Father

It cant be nicotine overdose at 1mg, I'm not chain vaping, I've switched to a fresh batch of nic from a different vendor. What else could it be? PG? I always use a 70vg/30pg mix can you get these symptoms from PG? Ive never had a problem with PG in 5 years of vaping.

Well, I'm using much cleaner nic now and still experiencing the same shit. Still only vaping at 1mg. Not sure what it could be, its quite discouraging because I enjoy vaping and its turned into a nice little hobby, diy-ing etc. Dont really want to give it up completely just yet, but I am baffled as to what could be making me feel like this.
and my kids cant even sweep the floor properly...
Thanks mate
Yep, thats who I just bought from :)
Kennedy
Have you had any 510 issues with this?
Yep, that nic is gone!, Ordering some new stuff with some pretty good reviews from New Zealand and should have that by the end of the week. Cheers for the glass bottle tip :)
Wow, thanks for this info! Gonna skip MFS for my nic now. I live in Aus so I was trying to find my cheapest option to import it here. MFS was the one!

I've been vaping .2 dual coil build @60 watts for awhile now so nothing has changed in that regard. [Pic of Nic]( http://imgur.com/a/CrMKn) I bought this mid 2015, still have heaps left but unfortunately I live in Australia, we don't sell nicotine here so I have to get everything from the US. which can be costly and slow!
Yeah it is good in a way, I'm just not 100% ready. Right now at 1mg I'm going through alot more juice.
Yes but I've been vaping .2 dual coil build @60 watts throughout all nic levels, 6mg3mg1.5mg1mg0.5mg So I haven't changed what I'm doing. Would have like to have stayed at 3mg tbh.
Well I'm not a chain vaper or anything. The nic I use is 100mg 50/50 But now I'm down to vaping 0.5 I'm pulling on it much more often.
I've been Vaping for 5 years and now I get headaches and slight nausea at 1%, which just seems wrong. Vaping direct lung at 60watts

Time should lessen nicotine content not strengthen it
Thats what I thought. The nic is definitely the problem. It took me a long time of being sick to figure that out, but you're right, looks like I need a new batch.
Yeah mine has been in a cool dark place, but not the freezer. I just wonder if old nic can have those effects on people?
My Freedom smokes Heres a pic http://imgur.com/a/CrMKn Also it says on it LOT# JUL 06 2015 Probably a bit past its used by date?

WRITING.TITLE: Regularly have to drop Nic level.
WRITING.TEXT:
I was wondering if anyone else has had this experience. Over the last few months I've had to drop my nic level alot. from 6mg down to currently 0.5mg. Not because I wanted to but because I couldn't handle it.
I will get headaches, slight nausea, dizziness and just a general unwell feeling. So I drop my nic level down and I feel ok for a week, then I start feeling shite again, drop the nic, feel good, rinse repeat. I find it strange that I cant handle a certain level for an extended period of time. Could it be the quality of my nicotine? It is kinda old and amber coloured. I havent noticed a difference in taste or smell though. Any thoughts?

I've been diying for about 3 years and buy my concentrates from Juice Factory. Even Vapoureyes has a good range. I buy my pg and vg from basedrop. 1 litre for $12, cant beat it. Oh and just to make things much easier for yourself, dont measure in volume, measure in weight, no need to mess around with syringes. Buy a set of scales and you're set. It's soo much more efficient.

https://www.instagram.com/kieranoconnorart/
I mostly do watercolour paintings and graphite drawings

I have the Griffin 25 plus and for the life of me cannot wick that thing properly. I've tried multiple different ways and, just dry hits. I gave up. The Aromamizer Plus rdta is good, though it is quite big, much bigger in person!
